verbose_text: This platform allowed us to sequence through the highly redundant DPP coding region without cloning, determine the pattern of indels in both DSPP alleles in each proband, and to identify frameshift mutations in the DPP repetitive region (and the haplotype in which they occurred) that caused DD-II and DGI-II.
evidence: DPP repetitive region (and the haplotype in which they occurred) that caused DD-II
